imdb.plot outline: A tribute to the actors Elias Kunelas and Ifiyeneia Griva that bring the art of theatre to hospitalized fellow citizens, giving them solidarity and hope. The documentary refers to an action of the National Theatre that brings the beneficial influence of art in the wards of hospitals, to those who need it more than anyone.
imdb.title: Episkeptirio
plot: A tribute to the actors Elias Kunelas and Ifiyeneia Griva that bring the art of theatre to hospitalized fellow citizens, giving them solidarity and hope. The documentary refers to an action of the National Theatre that brings the beneficial influence of art in the wards of hospitals, to those who need it more than anyone.
